Critics, including social media users and former Biden adviser Ajay Bhutoria, have accused Vance of racism, pointing out his marriage to an Indian-origin woman and highlighting the contributions of immigrants to the US economy and innovation.

title: ‘We’ve had some real disagreements with regards to what he wants. But that’s….’ Chief selector Ajit Agarkar recalls his time with former head coach Rahul Dravid
Ranji Trophy: Rinku surpasses Dravid, Jaiswal; scores career-best unbeaten 165
description: Rinku Singh's stellar 165 steered Uttar Pradesh to a draw against Andhra in their Ranji Trophy opener.  Coming in with UP struggling, Rinku's disciplined 273-ball innings, including a vital partnership, showcased his red-ball prowess.  This remarkable knock also saw him surpass notable Indian batters in first-class averages, highlighting his growing stature.

Bihar polls: Prashant Kishore exits political ring - Calculated gamble or misstep?
description: Jan Suraaj chief Prashant Kishor will not contest Bihar elections, aiming to disrupt the state's power dynamics instead. While rivals accuse him of accepting defeat, analysts suggest his focus on party candidates could be a strategic move. Kishor's ambitious target of winning over 150 seats will be tested against Bihar's complex political landscape.

description: Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj is emerging as a third force in Bihar, challenging the decades-long dominance of RJD and JD(U). The party aims to shift focus from caste politics to issues like employment and education, offering a local alternative. Despite Kishor not contesting, Jan Suraaj is poised to impact the upcoming elections.

description: Dhanteras 2025 gold buying: Investors who bet on gold and silver last Dhanteras and Diwali have seen bonanza returns. Are gold and silver good investment bets over the next year? We ask experts what the gold and silver price outlook is and what levels will they hit by Dhanteras 2026.

title: 'Every inch within range': Rajnath warns Pak, says Op Sindoor was 'just a trailer'
description: Describing BrahMos as a symbol of India’s rising strength, Singh said, "BrahMos is not just a missile, it is proof of India's strategic confidence. From the Army to the Navy and the Air Force, it has become a key pillar of our defence forces." He added that India’s defence capabilities now serve as a strong deterrent.

description: Vanessa Bryant, a devoted Los Angeles Dodgers fan, was recently seen cheering on the team with her daughters Bianka and Capri. The family celebrated as Shohei Ohtani led the Dodgers to an NLCS victory against the Milwaukee Brewers. Bryant also shared moments with Freddie Freeman's wife, Chelsea, at the star-studded game. The Dodgers defeated the Milwaukee Brewers with an overall score of 4-1.

description: His comments came after at least six people, including two children, were killed and seven others injured in airstrikes conducted by Pakistan in Afghanistan’s southeastern Paktika province. The strikes reportedly violated a recent ceasefire agreement between the two countries. Media reports said that representatives from both sides are expected to meet in Doha, Qatar, to address the situation.

title: The Democratic age wars begin
Bihar polls: Why Chirag Paswan is already a winner - even before 1st vote is cast
description: Chirag Paswan has emerged as a significant force within the NDA ahead of the Bihar elections. His party secured a substantial 29 seats in seat-sharing talks, more than any other junior ally. This success, coupled with a 100% win rate in the Lok Sabha polls, bolsters his bargaining power and positions him as a potential kingmaker in government formation.

title: Bihar polls: Mithilanchal gears up for high voltage battle - why it matters
description: Despite losing Faizabad in the Lok Sabha polls, the BJP aims to retain its stronghold in Bihar's Mithilanchal region. The party is banking on developmental projects and the consecration of the Ram temple to secure votes in the upcoming assembly elections, while the Mahagathbandhan campaigns to challenge its dominance.

title: Bihar polls: Does Left hold key to MGB's victory? What battle of 2020 reveals
description: In Bihar's 2020 elections, the Left parties, particularly CPI(ML), showed a strong performance, nearly matching the BJP's strike rate. Five years later, they are pushing for a larger seat share in the Mahagathbandhan, citing their past success and widespread presence, though negotiations remain uncertain.

Discussions are constructive, aiming for a win-win solution to boost bilateral trade.

Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
description: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: Viral claim debunked: Adam Sandler not joining Turning Point USA show
description: A viral rumor claiming Adam Sandler would perform at Turning Point USA's halftime show has been debunked.  Misleading social media posts, amplified by manipulated graphics, falsely linked the comedian to Lara Trump's event.  Sources confirm Sandler remains focused on his comedy and film projects, with no political ties to the organization.

title: Cardi B opens up on heartbreak and pain before welcoming baby with Stefon Diggs
description: Cardi B is preparing to welcome a child with Stefon Diggs while still legally married to ex-husband Offset. She recently revealed on Jay Shetty's podcast that she felt their marriage was dying and she chose to be lonely. Offset has since admitted to cheating during their marriage, which Cardi B announced her separation from in October 2024.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
description: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Blake Lively worried for Ryan Reynolds as Taylor Swift keeps her distance
description: Blake Lively is reportedly terrified about her husband Ryan Reynolds' future in Hollywood after Taylor Swift has allegedly cut ties with her. A source claims Swift has "totally shut her out," leaving Lively concerned about the repercussions of losing the pop star's influential friendship.

title: Gabrielle Union celebrates her father’s 81st birthday amid illness
description: Gabrielle Union celebrated her father's 81st birthday with a heartfelt Instagram message, expressing gratitude for their connection despite his ongoing battle with dementia. She shared touching moments, including his joy at seeing her and Dwyane Wade. Their daughter Kaavia also posted a touching tribute to her grandpa with an emotional post reflecting back to the time when she held his arms for first time.
